website_summaries.verdict: Nature's Way probotics can help regulate your digestion.
pros: Users report constipation, bloating, and nausea relief
Works for those with frequent digestive pain and those with stomach ulcers
cons: A few people report breakouts from the capsules

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING! Keeps everything as it should be
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! Keeps everything as it should be. If you've suffer from any issues like uti's or bv or yeast infections this stuff is LEGIT.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Found This!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several probiotics in my journey to healing my digestive issues. I have experienced better, and more prompt, results by using this product. Less bloating, less pain, less reflux, less of all the other unpleasantries of IBS, GERD, and 17 years of Nexium use!
customer_reviews.author: Cindie

customer_reviews.title: But This.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I was suggested by my doctors to take a probiotic daily. I didn’t like what was offered in store. After taking this for a week straight my health has taken a turn and Increased. If your looking for a femine probiotic to help with your lady area this is IT!
customer_reviews.author: Blovett

customer_reviews.title: Can't Live Without This Probiotic!
customer_reviews.text: This is a staple for me - I have ulcerative colitis and in the past have had major stomach and GI issues. This probiotic, coupled with a prescription medication from my GI doctor and some dietary changes has gotten my issues under control. I haven't had a flare-up in a few years, and this probiotic is key! They do sell this at some stores but it is cheaper here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Love this probiotic.
customer_reviews.text: I thought buying a probiotic that requires being refrigerated would be the way to go, but every time I switch I regret it and go back to this. I finally convinced my 16 year old daughter into taking it and her face really cleared up. Could be coincidence but she’s not going to stop taking!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These things are amazing. I am always regular now
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing. I am always regular now, and my periods are way less painful and much shorter. I have tried garden of life which has 50 billion but these work better than those!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Great probiotic!
customer_reviews.text: I had bariatric surgery and one of the complications can be constipation. I never had issues prior to surgery but they all started after surgery. I started taking probiotics about a month after surgery but the brand I tried before didn't work as well as Fortify has. I am regular and I feel good. I don't notice nausea after eating anymore. I will buy this probiotic again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: Good Probiotic
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mainly because of the good reviews. I like it. No tummy issues with this one. I think a higher count is unnecessary and can cause side effects. I’m sticking with this. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Andie

customer_reviews.title: I love LOVe LOVE love Looooove this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Don’t look anymore... trust me I tried quite a few other brands and I always come back to good ole faithful.. it’s does it’s job .. I suffer from bv on and off but not when I take these .. 30 days go by so fast and I forget but when order again I’m back to normal down there .. lol
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: These really work
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased my third bottle! These really work! I have issues my my stomach, acid reflex etc. I always take probiotics daily. It can take a bit for the affects to kick in so use the whole bottle before you change to another. I went through 2 bottles and then decided to switch to a cheaper brand and of course all my issues came back! So I went back to fortify because I know it works!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing. Dead bottle.
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on Sat. I immediately took one and did the milk test. Two days later, nothing. There wasn't any live bacteria. I'm extremely disappointed because I researched for over a month and went back & forth about which probiotic to try. I read a lot of the reviews about Fortify and decided this one would be a great one to try. Nope. Dead bottle. Now I have to figure out again which probiotic to spring for.
customer_reviews.author: Abbi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are uncoated & pretty large to swallow. Otherwise very good.
customer_reviews.author: Cari'anne

customer_reviews.title: Great for women
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other probiotics. Then I tried these. I'll never buy another brand again. They are a little more expensive, but with this product you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Bramby79

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I've been on this for over a month now. I think, for me, this works better than the other name brand I was taking and these are much more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn S.

customer_reviews.title: Good and works as designed.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good, I have been using them for a month now and I feel that they do aid in my digestion. Just have to be consistent in taking them daily. I like that you only need to take 1 pill a day, a lot of other probiotics require you take 2. I do feel that when I miss taking it a few days, it messes with my digestion. But other than that great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tiana

customer_reviews.title: Great for digestive issues
customer_reviews.text: I have IBS and have been happy with results from taking this particular probiotic periodically. I recently had to take antibiotics for a sinus infection, which usually causes major digestive problems for me. By taking these midday and my antibiotic morning and night, my stomach has been close to normal despite antibiotics! I will take it for a few days when my stomach is off-kilter, then skip it for a while until it’s needed again.
customer_reviews.author: Bibliophile85

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t good for me
customer_reviews.text: This product upsets my stomach. I have taken many different kinds of probiotics before and never have had an issue like this. I even tried three different times spaced apart to see if it was indeed this product making my stomach upset and it was.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K. Spurling

customer_reviews.title: Stomach issues gone!
customer_reviews.text: These have helped with my stomach issues immensely. I used to get a lot of upset stomachs because of gas and indigestion ( it’s a hereditary issue) I’ve been taking these for close to a year now, one right before bed and within just a week I noticed my stomach issues were way less, now I only have issues once a month or less. My husband actually noticed that I wasn’t complaining about my stomach aches anymore! I tried other brands but started having issues again. I’m sold on this brand and won’t switch again!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ann

customer_reviews.title: Its what works for me
customer_reviews.text: I have used Fortify for several years now and have found it to be the most effective of the ones I have tried. I like that they have an over 50 blend and now I have my wife taking the Womans's blend which is what this review is about. She has also found it effective in keeping her older body functioning well. Amazon is at least $4.50 less expensive than Walmart which previously was the least expensive I could find locally.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Great Product... but why the change in packaging?
customer_reviews.text: I love the product and have been using it for a while; however, this time it can in these foil packets instead of the normal glass bottle. This is odd, but more concerning because several of the little pods so to speak were damaged upon arrival. That being said, I won’t be using those that were damaged. I’m not thrilled about the change in packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly Hatton

customer_reviews.title: Great Probiotic
customer_reviews.text: I switched to a vegan diet, and all of the plant-based foods were upsetting my stomach because it was hard to digest. As soon as I started taking this probiotic, I noticed an immediate difference!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only probiotic that worked for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have POTS and my syndrome and my medication make constipation an awful reality. I tried to just increase my fiber intake but it didn't really help too much. Once I started taking this, I became incredibly regular and I feel so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney B

customer_reviews.title: Good probiotic
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a prebiotic/probiotic duo and settled on this one based on price and prior feedback. It did not disappoint. The pills were easy to swallow (I have trouble swallowing pills) and I had no side effects such as upset stomach or anything. I was regular and I attribute this to the product as once I ran out I noticed the change immediately. I’ll be placing another order.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my wife due to stomach pains. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife due to stomach pains. She takes 1 pill before bed and within a week has reported a huge increase in relief.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Chastain

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY probiotic that works for me. This stuff changed my life.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Carmody

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: A good product with no added “junk” like so many supplements
customer_reviews.author: Alva Rothell

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for several months and have it set to auto re-order. When I received my most recent order it came in a plastic container vs glass. I am looking to use less plastic so I will need to shop around for a new product.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I can't explain how I love this, It's very difficult for me to be regular, I tried changing eating habits, eating yogurt, oat meats, all type of things, and nothing work as this probiotics. I'm regular now
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: I wish it was smaller.  I suck at swallowing pills.
customer_reviews.text: This pill is very big is the reason I didnt give it a 5 star. My first time trying. Im not seeing a big difference but could be because im opening it and taking the powder out. No taste at all so dont be grossed out lol. I will try one more week before I give up on it. Only took twice
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Buy them if you have been on antibiotics
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I was so fatigued, bloated, and felt off balanced before taking this stuff. I had chronic uti and bv and I'm hoping this would put an end to it. Been on antibiotics for two years on and off, so I know I need these. And my stomach isn't bloated anymore.

customer_reviews.title: grea product

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work. Not even a little
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work. Not even a little bit. I have been taking probiotics for years and I do require a stronger strand. My body tends to get used to products a bit too easily so I change it up every few months, just for a month or so, and then go back to my original regimen. It helps. BUT this did not. Not at all. I’m extremely upset that this item is ineligible for return. Waste of $$

product_meta.title: Nature’s Way Fortify Women’s Probiotic, 30 Billion Live Cultures, 11 Strains, Prebiotic, 30 Capsules
product_meta.description: Size:30 Count (Pack of 1)Powerful probiotics for women's daily digestive & immune health* Fortify is a powerful ally with HN019, Bl-04, La-14, and HN001 researched probiotic strains to support digestive, immune, and vaginal health.* Formulated with 11 probiotic strains + prebiotics Fortify Women's 30 Billion CFU formula contains 11 probiotic strains designed to support gut diversity + prebiotics, a food source for good bacteria.* One Capsule, Multiple Benefits Taking Fortify every day helps: *Support vaginal health* *Promote digestive balance* *Support a healthy immune response* 30 Billion active cultures guaranteed! Innovative new bottle technology helps ensure this product will deliver 30 Billion live probiotic cultures until the date of expiration without refrigeration to help balance your intestinal tract and support immune health.* Targeted Delivery Each capsule is resistant to the harmful effects of stomach acid and distributes live cultures to the proper area of the small intestine and colon, right where they're needed most.
feature_bullets: Formulated for women with researched probiotic strains to support digestive, immune, and vaginal health.*
11 probiotic strains. Designed to support gut diversity PLUS prebiotics, a food source for good bacteria.*
Contains the doctor-preferred probiotic strain for regularity.**

Delayed release vegetarian capsules. Each capsule is resistant to the harmful effects of stomach acid and distributes live cultures to the proper area of the small intestine and colon — right where they’re needed most.
Guaranteed potency without refrigeration. Innovative new bottle technology ensures 30 billion live cultures until the date of expiration.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
